text:
I just sent my domestic worker to treat her tooth ache. Dr Joel attended to us. It turned out it was her wisdom tooth that was badly damaged. Dr Joel was assuring and calm despite seeing  such terrible condition of oral health. Extraction was done within minutes. Steady and confident gives patient a comforting experience. The nurse Hwee Yee is also friendly and helpful. My helper couldn't speak a bit of English but they patiently waited for me to translate line by line to her. Wonderful team indeed. Thank you Dr Joel 🙏🏼🫶🏼🙏🏼🫶🏼
(attached the image of her very badly decayed tooth)😱😱
Dr Joel Goh's skills and service attitude are very good. I pulled out three teeth and there was no pain at all. The doctor is also very careful and always cares about my condition.
Strongly recommended Dr Joel Goh , very professional and friendly Dr. There is no pain at all when my both wisdom tooth extracted. There was a good experience in QnM clinic, recommend Dr Joel 👍🏽

My 2nd time doing my routine clean up here. Both guy Drs are
providing . Great service and transparent doctors, will tell you price and fees before treatment begins, not pushy at all unlike other QnM branches, Had my painless wisdom tooth surgery with Dr Goh previously and cleaning done with Dr Sam. Both excellent Drs! will recommend

I highly recommend Dr. Joel at Elias Mall Q&M for dental care. His guidance and expertise made my experience comfortable and efficient. The clinic staff were also friendly. Dr. Joel's knowledge and attention to detail set him apart. He did follow up to ensure my satisfaction. Thank you, Dr. Joel and the team at Elias Mall Q&M, for the excellent service. Highly recommended!
